SEARCH
Package model

Klasse OthelloGame

java.lang.Object
model.OthelloGame
public class OthelloGame extends Object
The `OthelloGame` class represents the state and logic of an Othello game. It manages the game board, players, and game state, and provides methods to interact with the game.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    OthelloGame()
    Constructs a new Othello game, initializes players, board, and starts a thread for player actions.

      public boolean isValidMove(String position, Player player)
      Checks if the move at the specified position is valid for the given player.
      Parameter:
      position - The position of the move.
      player - The player making the move.
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the move is valid, otherwise false.
